title: The hOWLing Baby of County Down
description: Who would’ve thought that a baby’s cries could cause such a hullabaloo?Well that’s exactly what happened in a small sleepy town in Ireland where people didn’t know what to do.Where a howling baby had a roar louder than the biggest lion,and all the people and animals couldn’t get to sleep for all the crying.So if you want to know the unusual story that took place inside this book,you’ll have to open the pages and take a little look.Delve into this different and well written story in rhyme and its beautiful and well thought out illustrations. I think you’ll be pleasantly surprised.
author: John Downes
